text: Egha a Livain anabamɨn adaraziv gɨa ghaze, “O Ikiavɨra Itir God, Livain anabamɨn adarasi, me nɨ baghavɨra itir ingangarir gumazir aghuiba, nɨ dagɨar nɨn ifongiam gɨfofoghamin kamning me ganɨngi. Nɨ Masan danganim ko Meriban Dɨpar Emɨmɨrimɨn, men ganigh foghasa osɨmtɨzim me ganɨngi, ezɨ men araziba dera.
